A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was such a disappointment. I was invited to see it again for free and I had to decline. I don't want anything to do with this movie anymore after seeing it. I hate that it's apart of this trilogy..especially after such a great start with The Force Awakens. Even Rogue One was a good movie. The Last Jedi was just not good at all. Felt like a side quest movie where everything was pointless
